data.actual_result: The popup appears with the connect menu behind it, pressing "Okay" keeps the menu until closing that as well.
data.expected_result: The add friend to call popup should only appear on top of the DM chat not the connect menu.
data.short_description: When calling someone who is not in your friends list (such as a bot), the "need to be friends with x" popup appears, but the "Connect to Voice" menu appears behind it - popup should only appear on top of the DM channel.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a user that is not in your friends list (such as a bot). - Call this user. - When the popup appears, press "Okay" - Let the magic happen and the "Connect to Voice" menu with voice settings should appear. - May require one or two attempts, appears everytime for myself. - This may be inconsistency across devices but is a valid bug as of right now.
